original_text: The place where they put Jesus on the cross was near to the city. So many of the Jews read this notice. They could read it because Pilate had written the words in three languages. He had written it in the Jewish language and in the languages of the Roman people and the Greek people.
korean_text: 예수께서 못 박히신 곳이 성에서 가까운 고로 많은 유대인이 이 패를 읽는데 히브리와 로마와 헬라 말로 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: The place where they put Jesus on the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 예수님을 십자가에 못 박은 장소는

sentences.original_text: So many of the Jews read this notice
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 많은 유대인들이 이 문구를 읽었습니다

sentences.original_text: because Pilate had written the words
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 빌라도가 그 문구들을 적었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and in the languages of the Roman people
